scripts.build: rm -rf .parcel-cache/ dist/ && parcel build --no-source-maps src/index.html && cp src/static/* dist/ && mkdir -p dist/img/ && cp src/img/open-graph.webp dist/img/
scripts.deploy-dev: pnpm build && wrangler pages publish dist/ --project-name polymedia-timezones --branch dev
scripts.deploy-prod: pnpm build && wrangler pages publish dist/ --project-name polymedia-timezones --branch main
